Class XMLRealiserException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • simplenlg.xmlrealiser.XMLRealiserException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class XMLRealiserException
extends java.lang.Throwable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an exception thrown by the xml realiser framework.
    Author:
    Christopher Howell Agfa Healthcare Corporation, Albert Gatt, University of Malta
